author: Justine Calma
title: Air quality is way better in nine major cities after coronavirus confinement
description: Delhi, London, Los Angeles, Milan, Mumbai, New York City, São Paulo, Seoul, and Wuhan experienced drops in air pollution during coronavirus lockdowns, according to a new report.
content:
Delhi saw the most dramatic improvement 
DELHI, INDIA - 2020/04/19: A cyclist rides on an empty street during the COVID-19 pandemic.
Photo by Amarjeet Kumar Singh/SOPA Images/LightRocket via Getty Images
